metadata.title: CVE-2021-26826 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack overflow issue exists in Godot Engine up to v3.2 and is caused by improper boundary checks when loading .TGA image files. Depending on the context of the application, attack vector can be local or remote, and can lead to code execution and/or system crash.

criterions.comment: godot package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
